title: Load screen won't load past 33%
body:
So when i open up my league client, it opens per usual, but won't load or move past 33% 

Is anyone else having this problem? or does anyone know a fix?

replies.body:
Hi,

Have a look at the [patching issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) section of the support site.  There are some tips there for things you can try to get past this.
Leave it or repair the client.
there ignoring it alot of people have the probem
